children.name: Code complexity
desc: The computational complexity of the code: control, data, inheritance.

children.name: Control flow complexity
desc: The computational complexity of the control flow structure in the code functions.

children.name: Data flow complexity
desc: The complexity of the data flow structure in the code functions.

children.name: OO complexity
desc: The complexity of the object-oriented architecture and structure. Composed of MDIT (maximum depth of inheritance tree).

children.name: Code documentation
desc: The amount of documentation in the code: comment rate, javadoc, etc.

children.name: Code size
desc: The overall size of the code.

children.name: Access points
desc: The average amount of attributes and methods defined on a class, whatever their visibility is.

children.name: Public access points
desc: Average number of public classes, interfaces, methods, constructors, annotations and attributes.

children.name: Code cloning
desc: The amount of duplicated lines in the code.
Duplication makes changes to the code difficult, because the maintainer has to look for all instances of the modified code to propagate a fix.

children.name: Licensing
desc: Are licensing issues considered? Is there a list of licences used in the product?

children.name: IP Log
desc: Is the intellectual property of contributions checked and enforced?

children.name: SCM Documentation
desc: Measures the availability of information regarding SCM usage, conventions, access.
children.question: Is there some documentation about the SCM process, rules and conventions? How easy is it for a newcomer to use the configuration management tool?

children.name: ITS information access
desc: Measures the availability of information regarding ITS usage, conventions, access.
children.question: Is there some documentation about the ITS process, rules and conventions? How easy is it for a newcomer to use the issue tracking system?

children.name: ITS usage
desc: How much the ITS system was used recently.

children.name: Installations
desc: The level of usage of the product. How much is really used the software? In different contexts, in local or distributed teams, etc.

children.name: SCM information access
desc: Measures the availability of information regarding SCM usage, conventions, access.

children.name: SCM usage
desc: How much the SCM system was used during last month.

children.name: SCM Stability
desc:
How much the files are stable according to the SCM system. 
A file which has been heavily modified recently lacks experience, tests and feedback.

children.name: Analysability practices
desc: What practices (rules checked) related to analysability are violated, and how often?

children.name: Changeability practices
desc: What practices (rules checked) related to changeability are violated, and how often?

children.name: Reliability practices
desc: What practices (rules checked) related to reliability are violated, and how often?

children.name: Reusability practices
desc: What practices (rules checked) related to reusability are violated, and how often?

children.name: ITS Reliability
desc: The reliability assessment of the project regarding registered bugs.

children.name: Test coverage
desc: What percentage of the product has tests?

children.name: Number of tests
desc: The overall amount of tests executed for the project.

children.name: Test success density
desc: Are the available tests successful when executed?

children.name: Developer ML activity
children.question: How active is the developer mailing list?
desc: Activity on the developer mailing list.

children.name: User ML activity
children.question: How active is the user mailing list?
desc: Activity on the user mailing list.

children.name: SCM activity
children.question: How active is the developer mailing list?
desc: Activity on the software configuration management system.

children.name: Developer ML diversity
children.question: How many users have contributed to the developer mailing list?
desc: Diversity of users on the developer mailing list.

children.name: User ML diversity
children.question: How many users have contributed to the user mailing list?
desc: Diversity of users on the user mailing list.

children.name: SCM diversity
children.question: How many users have contributed to the software configuration management system?
desc: Diversity of users on the software configuration management system.

children.name: Developer ML responsiveness
children.question: How long have questions on the developer mailing list to wait before being answered?
desc: The delay of answers on the developer mailing list.

children.name: User ML responsiveness
children.question: How long have questions on the user mailing list to wait before being answered?
desc: The delay of answers on the developer mailing list.

children.name: Developer ML support
children.question: What amount of resources can be gathered from the developer mailing list?
desc: The quantity of information gathered by questions on the developer mailing list.

children.name: User ML support
children.question: What amount of resources can be gathered from the user mailing list?
desc: The quantity of information gathered by questions on the user mailing list.

children.name: Plan on time
desc: Is the project on time according to its schedule?

children.name: Milestones
desc: Is the project having regular milestones, do they prove to be effective?

children.name: Downloads
desc: What is the amount of downloads?

children.name: Marketplace feedback
desc: What is the feedback of users of the Eclipse Marketplace on the product?
If the product is not registered on the marketplace, the measure is set to zero.

children.name: Visibility in research
desc: How well-known is the software project in the academic field?
